description:
WiXEdit is an editor for XML source files for the Windows Installer XML (WiX) toolset to build MSI and MSM setup packages.


It provides a visual representation of the dialogs and an easy way to edit the WiX source files. This is a fork of http://wixedit.sourceforge.net/

## What's Changed

- Added support for loading a Wix 4 wxs file by @icnocop in #41

Full Changelog: https://github.com/WixEdit/WixEdit/compare/v0.8.1417.11...v0.8.2712.17
